definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: It is impossible to construct a resource-saving society without the formation of national notion of saving.
sentences.chinese: 建设资源节约型社会与全民节约观念的形成密不可分。

sentences.english: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
sentences.chinese: 幸福与道德责任密不可分。

sentences.english: William loves arts, and in his mind, arts and architecture is so inseparable.
sentences.chinese: 林伟而认为艺术与建筑是密不可分的。

sentences.english: On the one hand, I believe that art is inescapably political.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，我认为艺术和政治是密不可分的。
“外延”与“内含”往往是密不可分的。

sentences.english: Water is a necessity in every procedure of making tofu.
sentences.chinese: 做豆腐的各个环节都和水密不可分。

sentences.english: The universality that man presents in his relation with nature and that in his socia…
sentences.chinese: 人的普遍性同科学技术的发展密不可分。

sentences.english: Primitive music was inseparably connected with dancing.
sentences.chinese: 原始时期的音乐和舞蹈密不可分。

sentences.english: Therefore, classification and recycling can not be seperated.
sentences.chinese: 所以分类回收是密不可分的。

sentences.english: Significant progress in the text closely linked with the Wu.
sentences.chinese: 这一重大进展与吴生文密不可分。

sentences.english: Obtaining employment is highly correlated with the concrete social environment.
sentences.chinese: 劳动就业与具体的社会环境密不可分。

sentences.english: For Confucius, morality and political unity were natural bedfellows.
sentences.chinese: 对他而言，道义和政治统一是密不可分的。

sentences.english: By Meaghan Cameron Food is inextricably bound with romance.
sentences.chinese: 食物是与浪漫密不可分。

sentences.english: Thirdly, city develops with the suburb tourism inseparably, promote mutually.
sentences.chinese: 再次，城市发展与城郊旅游是密不可分，互相促进的。

sentences.english: The sky, the world above, is really bound up with the world below.
sentences.chinese: 高高在上的天空与，下面的世界确实密不可分。

sentences.english: They soon became inseparable and would be by each other's side all the time.
sentences.chinese: 狄斯妮和基拉很快就密不可分，总是如影随形。

definition: not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
close/familiar/intimate/closely (related)/to foster close ties/to pay close attention
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
